about_the_game:
Dive into the oppressive atmosphere of Lost in Nowhere, an intense blend of Action, Adventure, and Horror. Your mission: Solve three puzzles to escape a complex labyrinth. But beware, dangers lurk in the darkness... Creatures prowl in the shadows and will chase after you. Collect weapons and ammunition, and use them wisely. If you run out of ammunition, solving the puzzles and surviving become nearly impossible.

Relentless Pursuit

In the gloomy corridors of the labyrinth, terrible creatures lurk, waiting for a chance to drag you into the abyss. With only a limited amount of ammunition, you must carefully decide when to fight and when to flee.

Complex Puzzles

Three challenging puzzles stand between you and your freedom. Solve them and find the exit before time runs out and new threats are unleashed.

Explore Various Locations

The labyrinth leads to various eerie places. Discover an abandoned small town, wander through a creepy graveyard, climb a dilapidated tower, and explore a dark forest with a silent lake. Each location has its own challenges and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Time is the Enemy

A merciless countdown puts you under pressure as you navigate through the labyrinth. Every second counts as you solve the puzzles and aim to find the exit before new creatures are unleashed.

Fight for Survival

Find weapons and ammunition to defend yourself against the darkness, but be warned: Ammunition is scarce, and without it, the puzzles become nearly unsolvable.

content_descriptors.notes: Lost in Nowhere involves violence with weapons towards fictional creatures.

name: Lost in Nowhere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Experience a blend of Action, Adventure, and Horror in "Lost in Nowhere." Solve puzzles in a gloomy labyrinth while creatures hunt you down. Find weapons and survive!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
